milestones.title: Company Founded
milestones.description: MedRecords was established with a vision to revolutionize medical record management.

milestones.title: First Million Users
milestones.description: Reached our first major milestone of 1 million patients using our platform.

milestones.title: HIPAA Certification
milestones.description: Achieved full HIPAA compliance and SOC 2 Type II certification.

milestones.title: Global Expansion
milestones.description: Expanded operations to serve healthcare providers in over 50 countries.

milestones.title: AI Integration
milestones.description: Launched AI-powered medical record analysis and smart categorization features.

milestones.title: 2M+ Patients
milestones.description: Celebrating over 2 million patients and 50,000 healthcare providers on our platform.
